column1: Two adult loons with 2 chicks on Lake.  First successful hatch since 1999

column2: Cloudy bright. Distinct shadows.  Wind West 1 to 3 MPH
Sunny. Wind N 5 to 10 MPH.  Heavy thundershower at 6 AM.

column1: One loon chich disappeared from lake about 10 days ago.  Subsequently- Dr Meyer of DNR tagged both adults and remaining chick.
Two loons on lake.  No sign of chicks or nestings.
